publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7894 Linda Fabiani: Congratulations to Christopher Kane—That the Parliament congratulates Christopher Kane on winning the British Fashion Council/Vogue Designer Fashion Fund, which will allow this Scots designer the opportunity to develop his business into a global brand; compliments Vogue and the British Fashion Council on their forward-looking attitude in running the fund, and looks forward to Christopher Kane’s continued success in the world of fashion.
